text: Shehu Usman Aliyu Shagari, Turakin Sakkwato (25 February 1925 - 28 December 2018) was a Nigerian politician. He served as the President of Nigeria's Second Republic from 1979 to 1983. His government was given power by General Olusegun Obasanjo's military government. Shagari died on 28 December 2018 at a hospital in Abuja, Nigeria from a short-illness at the age of 93.Nigeria's first executive president, Shehu Shagari, dies aged 93 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Presidents of Nigeria
title: Shehu Shagari
